Photonic:

Play As The last ship of a once great space faring Civilization, you're being hunted down by the federation authority, because your kind are hated and shot on sight. Luckily for you your (now pretty much dead) civilization invested heavily in invisibility devices. Though you will be eventually overwhelmed, you can rest in comfort knowing that you have your "pea shooter" by your side, had your civilization had invested more into weaponry maybe you'd survive!

Controls: [Mouse to aim, HOLD Left Mouse button to shoot, WASD to move]

Ludum Dare link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/photonic
